full_text: Case 1:20-cr-00330-PAE Document 747 Filed 08/10/22 Page 160 of 228 836 LC2Qmax5 - corrected Alessi - Direct 1 A. I don't remember exactly how many times, but it was four, five times after. 2 Q. Who did you observe Jane spending time with when she came without her mother to the house? 3 A. Ms. Maxwell and Mr. Epstein. 4 Q. To your knowledge, how did Jane get to Mr. Epstein's house when she would visit without her mother? 5 A. I was -- I was told to pick her up. Either Ms. Maxwell or Mr. Epstein instruct me to pick her up couple times. 6 Q. I want to be clear here. Did Mr. Epstein instruct you to pick her up? 7 A. Either him or Ms. Maxwell. 8 Q. You remember Ms. Maxwell instructing you to pick her up? 9 A. Yes, I do. 10 Q. And do you also remember Mr. Epstein instructing you -- 11 A. Yes, I do. 12 Q. -- to pick her up? 13 A. Yes, I do. 14 Q. Where do you remember picking Jane up? 15 A. I remember picking Jane at the School of the Arts one time, only one time in West Palm Beach. That was the old Palm Beach 16 Lakes High School, and they turn it into a School of the Arts, and I pick her up outside the school one time and brought her to Palm Beach. 17 Q. Other than school, where else did you pick up Jane? SOUTHERN DISTRICT REPORTERS, P.C. (212) 805-0300 DOJ-OGR-00012445

Where do you remember picking Jane up? 15 A. I remember picking Jane at the School of the Arts one time, only one time in West Palm Beach. Other than school, where else did you pick up Jane?
